name: Social Distancing
description: Maintain 6 feet minimum distance between occupied desks

name: Desk Sanitization
description: Desks must be sanitized and remain unused for 4 hours after use

name: Accessibility Priority
description: Employees with accessibility needs have priority for accessible desks

name: Team Zones
description: Teams should be seated in their designated zones when possible

name: Capacity Limits
description: Floor occupancy should not exceed 80% of total capacity
